questions.text: And which Days did she come?
Can I really trust you ;when you say that Anthony Brown has never been here?;It's important you know?;Have you heard about what happened?;Jess Brown's been murdered,;and her son has disappeared.

answers.text: Yep;With a regular client of mine;his name is James...;James Stuart I believe
I'm sorry, I don't remember that;I'm quite busy having a life, you know?

questions.text: Of course I am...;and I need you to cooperate;I can get you arrested you know?

answers.text: Okay darling...;chill...;are you being serious with all that?

questions.text: Of course I am.;And the first suspect for the case;is his husband, Anthony.;So if you really know something about him...

answers.text: Erm... darling, I didn't tell you that okay?;But... yeah, he's been playing regularly here.;Playing...;Poker games.;Trust me, he was here last night, alright?;He didn't kill her, come on darling,;he was here the whole night.

questions.text: Calm down;Ok. I'm going to trust you...;Maybe I should go back home and;find out who that James Stuart guy is
